name: NSTextSelection.Affinity
desc: Values that describe the visual location of the text cursor, or the direction of the non-anchored edge of the selection.

items.name: case downstream
items.desc: The value that defines the visual location of the text cursor between the head of line that contains the selection location.

items.name: case upstream
items.desc: The value that defines the visual location of the text cursor to the tail of the previous line.
